tool_description: Filters content based on keyword matches, relevance scoring, and inclusion/exclusion rules to focus on relevant information.

minimum_relevance_score.description: Minimum relevance score to include content (0-1)

error_messages: Relevance score out of range: minimum_relevance_score must be between 0 and 1.
Too many keywords: Maximum 50 include keywords and 50 exclude keywords allowed.
Empty keyword list: At least one include keyword must be provided.
usage: Provide content and include keywords for filtering. Optionally add exclude keywords and adjust match type and relevance threshold.

filtered_content.description: Content items that passed the keyword filter

relevance_scores.description: Relevance scores for each filtered item

matched_keywords.description: Keywords that were matched in the content

filtered_count.description: Number of items that passed the filter
